title: Wout van Aert Hits 3rd in Tour de France Comeback Bid: ‘I Felt Better Than I Hoped For’
content:
Van Aert says it's too early to say if he'll be at the Tour de France: 'We will evaluate to see what lies ahead.'

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Hits 3rd in Tour de France Comeback Bid: ‘I Felt Better Than I Hoped For’ on Velo.
author: ahood
